entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: The Polyjuice Potion is mentioned as 161 in the text. It is a magical potion that allows the drinker to take on the appearance of someone else.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle's forehead and hairs are stolen by Harry and Ron. He has large feet.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron pulled out several of Crabbe's hairs and stole their shoes with Harry.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe's hairs are stolen by Harry and Ron. He has large feet.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Harry and Ron sprinted up to Moaning Myrtle's bathroom.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is stirring the cauldron in the cubicle. She is shiny-faced and looking anxious.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry knocked softly on the door with Ron.

relationships.description: The Polyjuice Potion is used to transform Harry and Ron into Crabbe and Goyle.
Harry drinks the Polyjuice Potion to become Goyle.
Ron drinks the Polyjuice Potion to become Crabbe.
Harry and Hermione are working together to use the Polyjuice Potion.
Ron and Hermione are working together to use the Polyjuice Potion.
